item.title: Navy SEALs: Stories From America's Most Elite Special Operators
item.description: Navy SEALs: Stories From America's Most Elite Special Operators

media:content.media:title: Navy SEALs: Stories From America's Most Elite Special Operators
media:content.media:description: Navy SEALs: Stories From America's Most Elite Special Operators

item.title: The Enemy Told Us "Surrender or Die!"
item.description: Faced with an impossible choice under enemy fire, soldiers were given the chilling ultimatum: surrender or die. See how courage, grit, and sheer willpower decided the outcome in this harrowing WWII story.

item.title: Andrew Card: The Man Who Warned the President
item.description: He was the one who leaned in and delivered the words that changed everything on 9/11. Discover Andrew Card’s story and the historic moment he warned President Bush.

item.title: How I Became 'The Angel of Death'
item.description: A look into the story of the figure known as ‘The Angel of Death,’ exploring the events and choices that led to this infamous reputation.

item.title: How My Fellow Marines Saved My Life Under Fire
item.description: In the middle of chaos and heavy fire, brotherhood made all the difference. Hear the powerful story of how Marines risked everything to pull one of their own to safety.

item.title: Medal of Honor: Landing in a Minefield to Save 51 Men
item.description: An unbelievable act of courage—discover the story of the Medal of Honor hero who risked everything by landing in a deadly minefield to rescue 51 trapped soldiers. True bravery in the face of certain danger.

item.title: What Surprised Me Most About Being on the Moon
item.description: Walking on the Moon wasn’t what I expected—here’s the most surprising part of the experience that no one talks about.

item.title: Landing in the First Wave on Omaha Beach on D-Day
item.description: Landing in the First Wave on Omaha Beach on D-Day

item.title: The Moment We Knew We Were Going Home
item.description: The Moment We Knew We Were Going Home

item.title: Destroyer Combat: Knocking Out German Bunkers on D-Day
item.description: On D-Day, U.S. Navy destroyers charged in dangerously close to shore, unleashing relentless fire to silence German bunkers pinning down the troops at Omaha Beach. Witness the bravery, precision, and raw firepower that turned the tide of battle.

item.title: The First Man Killed Was by Friendly-Fire
item.description: War is chaos, and sometimes the greatest tragedy comes not from the enemy—but from our own side. This is the heartbreaking story of how the first casualty fell, not by enemy hands, but by friendly fire.

item.title: He Fought Back With the Germans
item.description: He Fought Back With the Germans

item.title: Drydock Was Nothing Like Being at Sea
item.description: Drydock Was Nothing Like Being at Sea

item.title: Hand-to-Hand Combat in the Mountains of Korea
item.description: I share my experience training and fighting in the rugged mountains of Korea, highlighting the intensity and challenges of close combat.

item.title: I Didn't Realize the Sniper Had Me in His Sights
item.description: I share the tense moment I realized a sniper had me in his sights during combat, giving a firsthand view of life on the battlefield.

item.title: How I Learned To Fight in Vietnam | David Rodriguez
item.description: David Rodriguez shares his journey of training and survival in Vietnam, giving a firsthand look at the challenges soldiers faced.

item.title: Protecting Omaha Beach From The Skies on D-Day
item.description: A look at the Allied air support missions that shielded troops landing on Omaha Beach, targeting enemy positions and paving the way for the invasion’s success.

item.title: The First Things I Saw As I Entered The Battle
item.description: A raw, unfiltered account of the sights burned into memory from the very first moments on the battlefield.

item.title: The Secret Tragedy of World War II
item.description: I delve into a lesser-known story from WWII, shedding light on the sacrifices and challenges faced away from the front lines.

item.title: How to Upset An Enemy Interrogator
item.description: I explore techniques used to stay composed and resilient during tough interrogations, focusing on mental strength and strategy.
